Articles.Content:
Ladies and gentlekerbals, ATLAS Corporation is proud to present our newest oldest fighter!

The Doppelkampfer

This biplane may look old (And she is!) But that doesn't stop her from packing a punch!

Now, we may or may not have found this sitting in the hanger at the island airstrip and refurbished her, but she makes an effective fighter-bomber. Her weapon capacity is (2) MK82 500lb bombs, and (1) cockpit-mounted Browning AN/M2 .50 caliber machine gun. Her top speed is 82 m/s, though that can go down to 20 while doing extensive maneuvering. She's also one of our most maneuverable craft yet! (Possibly due to being made from wood and canvas) Able to fly at ~30 m/s, this means you could probably jump out and survive! (Warranty void if attempted) 

Images/Download Link

https://www.dropbox.com/s/bf6g3tx5hwg32e7/Doppelkampfer.craft?dl=0
Nice job, ocean swimmer! Gonna try it, as soon as I have all my mods updated to 1.1.3!
